segments.text: I'm looking at a very detailed line drawing of a kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's daytime, and an open window offers a view outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, I see a calm and tidy garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a path with low bushes and a fence in the distance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything outside looks so peaceful and orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes the chaos unfolding inside seem even more striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast between the two scenes is almost heartbreaking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, water is ruining the floor, and children are in danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues her task, oblivious to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It feels like a moment frozen in time, right before things go wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them about the impending mishaps.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The beauty of the garden just highlights the silent domestic drama.
segments.speaker: PAR
